description:
At the United Nations OSPOs for Good Conference, we were once more reminded of the curious situation of AI and open source programs: While the foundations of AI are built on open source tools and libraries, almost no major AI program is truly open source. OpenAI’s ChatGPT, Google’s PaLM (and its successor, the multimodel Gemini), […]

The post Open-Source AI: What About Data Transparency? appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Open-Source AI: What About Data Transparency?

description:
Manjaro.org relaunches with a minimalistic, cleaner design and enhanced enterprise offerings.

The post Manjaro Linux Launches Revamped Website appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Manjaro Linux Launches Revamped Website

description:
PipeWire 1.2.1 multimedia framework update brings better audio with KODI, smoother KDE previews, and robust script execution.

The post PipeWire 1.2.1 Update Fixes Audio Bugs Across Multimedia Apps appeared first on Linux Today.
title: PipeWire 1.2.1 Update Fixes Audio Bugs Across Multimedia Apps

description:
The Mozilla Thunderbird 128 open-source email client has been released as a major update that introduces many new features, improvements, and bug fixes.

The post Mozilla Thunderbird 128 ESR Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Mozilla Thunderbird 128 ESR Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New

description:
This is your friendly reminder that Ubuntu 23.10 “Mantic Minotaur” reached end-of-life yesterday, July 11th, 2024, which means that it will no longer be supported with software and security updates.

The post Ubuntu 23.10 “Mantic Minotaur” Reached End of Life, Upgrade to Ubuntu 24.04 LTS appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Ubuntu 23.10 “Mantic Minotaur” Reached End of Life, Upgrade to Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
